name: Daddy Long Legs (itch)
description:
* UPDATE *

There was a major gameplay-halting soft-lock that prevented the player from being able to move or restart the game. I have uploaded a new executable package with the fixes and have kept the broken version as evidence of my compliance with the submission time. DO NOT PLAY THE BROKENDLL VERSION

Overview

Set in a not-so-distant future, hitman and headhunter Daddy Long Legs has a big and new contract to complete. Battle through waves of mutant bug-thugs, break into the target's lair, and kill him to complete your current mission.

Controls Important Items Tips & Useful Info

- This project is low poly but has many textures and lighting effects in place. That being said, there may be noticable FPS lags when playing on lower-end machines.

- Health and ammo crates are sparse and do NOT respawn. Try to properly manage your resources throughout the mission.

- Headshots do double damage to all enemies. Better accuracy = more reserve ammo.

- I never really implemented a proper death screen, so if you got booted back to the main menu.... you died, homie
